title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.9 - Return of premium
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 28.9 - Return of premium

State Regulations

An insurer or a bail agent shall refund the full premium paid by the indemnitor if the principal is not released from custody, within 14 days of receipt of notice that the principal was not released. If there is more than one indemnitor, the amount refunded to each indemnitor shall be the amount that the indemnitor paid. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
